content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5) connected to a pipe at Position (-47.5, -122.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0) with a Wooden Chest at Drop Position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at Position (9.0, -64.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5) not receiving electricity
- Wooden Chest at Position (7.5, -61.5) containing iron plates
- Wooden Chest at Position (6.5, -59.5) containing iron ore and iron plates

### Pipe Network
Multiple Pipe Groups with varying statuses, primarily empty, connecting various positions:
- Pipe Group at Position (-47.5, -122.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-35.5, -122.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-44.5, -116.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-45.5, -115.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-40.5, -114.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-48.5, -111.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-37.5, -111.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-43.5, -109.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-1.5, 11.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-0.5, 17.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-12.5, 23.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (-4.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (1.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group at Position (2.5, 25.5)

### Electricity Network
- Electricity Group with poles connecting various positions, voltage is currently 0

### Lab
- Lab with input of automation science pack, currently not receiving power

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when attempting to get an entity at a specific position
- Verify the presence of the entity type at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it

### Errors when connecting to the power network without required items
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities to the power network

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Check your inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into entities
